story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful land of Iran, there lived a young boy named Amir. Amir was a kind and curious boy who loved to explore the world around him.

One night, as he lay in bed, he looked out his window and saw a shooting star streak across the night sky. Amir closed his eyes and made a wish upon the star. He wished for exciting adventures and new friends to join him on his journey.

The next day, as Amir was playing in the fields near his home, he heard a rustling in the bushes. Curious, he went to investigate and found a little fox cub trapped in a thorn bush. The fox looked scared and lonely, so Amir carefully freed him and offered him some food.

The fox, whose name was Faraz, thanked Amir and told him that he had been looking for a friend to explore the world with. Amir's eyes lit up with excitement as he realized that his wish had come true.

From that day on, Amir and Faraz became the best of friends. They traveled through the lush forests, climbed the towering mountains, and sailed across the glittering seas together. Along the way, they met many fascinating creatures and learned valuable lessons about friendship, bravery, and kindness.

As the sun began to set, casting a warm glow over the land of Iran, Amir and Faraz settled down under the twinkling stars. Amir smiled and whispered, "Thank you for being my friend, Faraz. I'm so grateful for all the adventures we've shared."

Faraz nuzzled against Amir, his tail wagging happily, and replied, "And I am grateful for you, my dear friend. Let us always remember to treasure our friendship and the wonderful memories we've made together."

And so, under the watchful gaze of the moon and the stars, Amir and Faraz drifted off to sleep, their hearts full of joy and their dreams filled with endless possibilities.

Goodnight, dear child. Sweet dreams and may your heart always be filled with friendship and love, just like Amir and Faraz.
